liability_cap: Not specified in provided excerpts (termination does not release liability for prior breaches).
risk_explanation: This is an amendment/termination agreement that preserves liability for breaches and includes ongoing D&O indemnity obligations for liabilities arising prior to the closings. No explicit liability cap or termination-for-convenience notice period is shown in the excerpts, which can increase exposure/uncertainty. Governing law is Japan, which may add complexity for a small SaaS vendor.
